document_data.mainbody:
Net Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Net Street was located in the south section of Waterdeeps Dock Ward. It branched west off of the Way of the Dragon then turned southwest to terminate on Dock Street on the waterfront with an intersection with Keel Alley. Snail Street and Pressbow Lane connected with Net Street near its midpoint.
The Hanged Man tavern was located at the intersection of Net Street and Snail Street and Full Sails tavern was located on the waterfront. The Blushing Mermaid sat on the intersection with Keel Alley.
